summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Columbia Street, in the City of Seattle, from 3rd Avenue to 4th Avenue, by paving the same with sandstone blocks laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing granite curbs and concrete sidewalks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 981 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
